option.name: title_text
option.value: Towards a Net Zero World Demo

string_table.name: npnxnanbnsnfns00000000001
string_table.string: Use the w, a, s, and d keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.
To watch this video, use the preview feature in Storyline 360, upload your published output to a server, publish to Review 360, or switch to static video quality.
Streaming video is unavailable for local playback.

resource_data.description: Here are some useful links and documents:

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript:
<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Global temperatures have increased significantly in the past fifty years, and extreme weather events and natural disasters are becoming more frequent and severe.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This figure plots the global average surface temperatures from 1880 and shows a clear upward trend increasing between 0.6 to 0.9 degrees Celsius over the last 100 years, with the rate of temperature increases nearly doubling in the last 50 years.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This unusually rapid increase in the Earth's average surface temperature over the past century is primarily due to the greenhouse gases released as we burn fossil fuels.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="These gases include carbon dioxide, methane, nitrous oxide and others.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Global warming, change in precipitation patterns and more volatile weather events can have long-term macroeconomic effects by adversely affecting labor productivity, slowing investment and damaging people's health, as well as significantly impacting innovation and entrepreneurship.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="These are some of the damaging effects of climate change.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Climate change is not only a macro trend, but also a mega trend.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="It's a systemic issue that is not always easily identifiable, but it is one that impacts everyone across the globe with spill-over effects that threatens vital sectors and industries while providing opportunities for others.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The economic effects of climate change stretch far beyond the impact on crop yields in the agricultural sector, for example.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Heavy rainfall prevents mountain access from mining and affects commodity prices. Cold snaps raise heating bills and retail spending drops. Heat waves and droughts cause transport networks to shut down, interrupt supply chains, delay construction projects and lead to costly production volatility, which has an adverse effect on labor productivity.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="We will explore how all these effects add up later in this module.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The warming and cooling of our planet is not a new phenomenon.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This figure shows that while the Earth has cycled between ice ages and several warmer periods than we are currently experiencing, there is a huge difference between what has happened in the past and the global temperature increases we have seen over the last century.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Current global warming is occurring much faster than in the past.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="For instance, following the Ice ages, global temperatures usually increased by 4 to 7 degrees Celsius over a 5000 year.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="But in the last half century, we have seen temperature increases by around 0.5 degrees Celsius, which is about 10 times faster than the average rate of an Ice Age recovery warming.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="And this is happening across the globe.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Representative concentration pathways RCP, or scenarios of greenhouse gas concentrations constructed by the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC).
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="In this figure, RCP 2.6 corresponds to the Paris Agreement, which aims to limit the increase in the global average temperature to below 2 degrees Celsius above preindustrial levels.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="RCP 8.5 is an unmitigated scenario in which emissions continue to rise throughout the 21st century.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="If no mitigating action is taken, the earth will warm by up to 6 degrees Celsius above preindustrial levels in the next 80 years.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This is represented by the RCP 8.5 scenario.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This is a substantial increase and implies that the warming between now and the year 2100, is at least 20 times faster than what we have experienced in the past million years. This rate of change is extremely unusual.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="However, if the world abides by the Paris Agreement pledges and manages to keep the increase in the global average temperature to below 2 degrees Celsius above preindustrial levels over the rest of the 21st century, this will limit the increase in temperatures substantially.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This is shown by the RCP 2.6 scenario.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Therefore, global temperatures would only increase by around 1 degree Celsius from current levels.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="To achieve this more measured change and thereby mitigate the adverse impacts of climate change on the planet and on our economies, we need to reduce emissions released in the atmosphere.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This is the crux of what it means to transition to a net zero world.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" TrailingMargin="0" LineSpacingRule="AtLeast" LineSpacing="20"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#323130" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

terms.term: Managing overall CO2 emissions outputs to achieve net-zero, either through reduction of CO2 emissions or by purchasing carbon offset credits.
Managing overall CO2 emissions outputs to achieve net-zero, and eliminating other harmful gases beyond carbon, including methane and nitrous oxide.
Governmental policy mechanisms designed to promote the uptake of renewable and low-carbon electricity generation.
Finding ways of producing without emitting greenhouse gases on net.
The creation of new technologies, processes, and products which reduce climate risk and lead to environmental breakthroughs.
Gases released as we burn fossil fuels. These gases include carbon dioxide, methane, nitrous oxide, and others.
A mathematical identity which expresses total CO2 emissions as population multiplied by income per person, multiplied by CO2 emissions per US dollar of income.

Reducing greenhouse gas emissions to zero by balancing the amount released into the atmosphere from various sources with the amount removed and stored by carbon sinks, either re-absorbed from the atmosphere, by oceans and forests for instance, or through various technologies, such as Carbon Capture and Storage.
Scenarios of greenhouse gas concentrations constructed by the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC).
